metadata.title: CVE-2010-2252

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15

metadata.description: GNU Wget 1.12 and earlier uses a server-provided filename instead of the original URL to determine the destination filename of a download, which allows remote servers to create or overwrite arbitrary files via a 3xx redirect to a URL with a .wgetrc filename followed by a 3xx redirect to a URL with a crafted filename, and possibly execute arbitrary code as a consequence of writing to a dotfile in a home directory.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 is installed
